original_text: The believers who had left Jerusalem went to many different towns. In each place, they told the people the message about Jesus.
korean_text: 그 흩어진 사람들이 두루 다니며 복음의 말씀을 전할새

sentences.original_text: The believers who had left Jerusalem
they told the people the message about Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들에게 예수님에 대한 메시지를 전했습니다
